表格维修单详情的代码预览

drop table if exists wxxqd;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: wxxqd */
/*==============================================================*/
create table wxxqd
(
wxqid int not null,
insid int,
rid int,
sum int,
couponmoney float(10),
datepmoney float(10),
primary key (wxqid)
);

alter table wxxqd add constraint FK_维修单维修项目 foreign key (insid)
references instation (insid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table wxxqd add constraint FK_维修的项目 foreign key (rid)
references Repair (rid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
